name: Leaves at Midnight
description:
Leaves at Midnight by Dream Sloth Games

You are a lawyer who is tasked with proving that Noita, a young woman accused of witchcraft, is innocent. You must find evidence and collect leaves (red, green, gray) to prove her innocence. If you fail, she will burn at the stake at midnight.

You start at noon and you have until midnight! Make sure to prepare for court before the trial.

This two button game involves making a choice between two decisions. You won’t have time to do everything, so choose wisely!

Mouse controls:

  • Left click, chooses left option
  • Right click, chooses right option

We welcome all feedback! This is our first game release as a group and this  game originally started as a much larger story with more scenes , options and decisions planned. We scaled back so we could create it within the time frame of the game jam.

We hope you have fun. Feel free to follow us at @dreamslothgames!
